message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. My initial offer for the product is $850,000. I'm confident you'll see the value it brings, and I'm looking forward to your response.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for this product. However, my budget for this purchase is $800,000. I'm confident this product is worth that amount to me, and I'm hoping we can reach a mutually agreeable price.

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I have to consider the value I've placed on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than $800,000. My counteroffer is $820,000. I'm confident you'll see the value it brings and be willing to make a slight adjustment to your budget.
